description: PPG Title: Landscape approach to management of peatlands aiming at multiple ecological benefits.

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: The objective of this Project Preparation Grant is to develop a full project document for a UNDP/GEF project in the multifocal area, addressing barriers to biodiversity conservation, problems with land and soil degradation, issues of climate change and challenges to manage forests in a sustainable way through adopting in Belarus a new landscape approach to management of peatlands aiming to bring multiple ecological benefits.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: PIMS4419PPG:PEATLII

title: GEF PIMS 4419 PPG:PEATLANDS II
